alert.note: Alert for Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 17 at 9:56PM EST until February 18 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 to 4 inches, highest across the eastern half of Porter County. * WHERE...Porter County. * WHEN...Until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on encountering snow covered roadways. Blowing snow will also significant reduce visibilities at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates near or briefly in excess of one inch per hour, combined with strong and gusty winds, especially near the lakefront, will result in very low visibilities and add to the treacherous nature of travel in the warning area.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Indiana are available by calling 1- 800-261-7623.
